Israeli army approaches Gaza City: 'We are not waiting'
description: With Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu yet to make a decision on a temporary ceasefire proposal, maneuvers are underway around the Gaza Strip's largest city, which the army calls a Hamas 'stronghold.' More than 120,000 reservists are expected to be deployed on the ground in the coming weeks.

Zelensky says could meet Putin only after allies agree on Ukraine security guarantees
description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov on Thursday accused Ukraine of making unrealistic security demands, saying that any deployment of European troops to the country would be 'absolutely unacceptable.'

headline: Macron vows to 'defend my honor' amid viral smear campaign against his wife
description: The French president addressed the false claim that his wife, Brigitte Macron, was born a man in an interview with 'Paris Match.' He said he was prepared to pursue legal action 'all the way' to ensure the main spreaders of the lie are held accountable.

headline: Violence against women: 'France would benefit from implementing a unified policy under a specialized prosecutor's office'
description: In France, national prosecutors for financial crime and anti-terrorism have proven effective. Gender-based violence warrants the same level of action and coordination, writes Vanessa Bousardo, vice president of the Paris Bar Association.

headline: Why scientists are divided over whether there is a 'sixth mass extinction'
description: American researchers have reignited the debate over the concept by publishing an article that questions the idea of a new mass extinction event that is comparable in scale to the one that wiped out the dinosaurs.

In the Donbas, a Ukrainian high schooler's rebellion against Russification
description: At her Russian-controlled high school near Luhansk, a pro-Ukrainian teenager who resisted propaganda was the target of relentless disciplinary action since January. Fearing that she could be placed in foster care or even adopted, her mother decided to flee the occupied territory.

headline: Why heat and drought are making trees look like autumn is coming early
description: In some regions, drought combined with extreme heat has led to defoliation, a phenomenon that, if recurring, can cause forest dieback.

headline: What is Kick, the platform on which a French streamer died live?
description: Raphaël Grave, known online as Jean Pormanove, died Monday during a livestream. The tragedy has shed light on a little-known streaming site and its extremely permissive moderation policies.
